001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.update;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.dns.update.spi.DnsUpdateProvider;
005import jakarta.inject.Inject;
006import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
007import org.glassfish.hk2.api.IterableProvider;
008import org.glassfish.hk2.api.ServiceHandle;
009import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
010import org.xbill.DNS.Record;
011
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.Spliterators;
014import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
015import java.util.concurrent.CompletionStage;
016import java.util.stream.Stream;
017import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
018
019@Service
020public class DnsUpdates {
021
022    private final IterableProvider<DnsUpdateProvider> providers;
023    private final Configuration configuration;
024    private final Logger logger;
025
026    @Inject
027    public DnsUpdates(IterableProvider<DnsUpdateProvider> providers, Configuration configuration, Logger logger) {
028        this.providers = providers;
029        this.configuration = configuration;
030        this.logger = logger;
031    }
032
033    public CompletionStage<Void> updateDns(String zone, List<Record> dnsUpdates) {
034        return StreamSupport.stream(providers.handleIterator().spliterator(), false).map(h ->
035                {
036                    logger.info("Updating DNS records for provider:" + h.getActiveDescriptor().getName());
037                    return h.getService().updateDns(zone, dnsUpdates);
038                }).reduce((c1, c2) -> c1.thenCombine(c2, (v1, v2) -> v1))
039                .stream().findFirst()
040                .orElseGet(() -> CompletableFuture.failedStage(new IllegalStateException("No DNS update provider available")));
041    }
042
043    public CompletionStage<Void> updateDns(List<Record> dnsUpdates) {
044        return updateDns(configuration.getString("instance.domain").orElse("local"), dnsUpdates);
045    }
046}
